casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF DEMETRIUS C. et al., etc. David C., Respondent, Administration for Children's Services, Respondent,
v.
Epifania C., Intervenor-Appellant. In the Matter of Epifania C., Appellant,
v.
David C., Respondent. Motion No: 2018-87 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided March 27, 2018

Motion for leave to appeal dismissed upon the ground that the order sought to be appealed from does not finally determine the proceedings within the meaning of the Constitution. Motion for poor person relief dismissed as academic. Motion for a stay dismissed as academic.
